13804e93-3026-403f-9b1d-c15022d0e4c1.description: The earner of this badge is a Digital Skills course participant who has demonstrated fundamental skills in basic data analytics using the Python programming language and by identifying the principles of scientific thinking and applying them in the context of data science.
13804e93-3026-403f-9b1d-c15022d0e4c1.name: Fundamentals of Data Analytics with Python

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Python Basics over the first four weeks of the course, introducing to data science and python, before stepping through Lambdas, Functions, Data Structures, NumPy and Pandas.
Complete Data management over the second four weeks of the course, covering Technical writing, Ethics, Data wrangling, Data cleaning and Data visualisation.

Complete Exploratory Data Analysis over the final four weeks of the course, covering Mathematics Basics (with a focus on Statistics), provide multiple opportunities to practise exploratory data analysis, and conclude with an introduction to Regression.

Submit three artefacts as part of a portfolio on Data Challenges; a series of short application-based tasks, two case Studies in a written report (Jupyter notebook) along with evidence of Git documentation and version control and presentation in recorded and written (Jupyter notebook). A pass grade is required for all three artefacts.

d65069ce-0617-4474-84aa-f598c0758626.description: The earner of this badge is a Digital Skills course participant who has demonstrated foundations for exploring Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence (AI); using software to develop and implement machine learning techniques.
d65069ce-0617-4474-84aa-f598c0758626.name: Introduction to Machine Learning

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Alogrithms over the first four weeks of the course, introducing participants to AI and Machine Learning, before stepping through an introduction to data structures, repetition, sorting, complexity, graphs and searching.

Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) over the second four weeks of the course will cover: Data Management (wrangling and cleaning); Simple linear equations; Advanced regression techniques; and Interpreting data (including ethics and data bias).
Neutral Networks over the final four weeks of the course covers Size and structure, Training methodologies and concludes with ethical considerations and the future of AI.

Submit three artefacts as part of a portfolio on Algorithms; a series of short application-based tasks, a Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) and Neutral Networks in a written report and peer presentation. A pass grade is required for all three artefacts.

19c9d3b8-1e64-4ef1-8f22-7ae1de0e94d3.description: The earner of this badge was an outstanding performer throughout the training component of the Monash Professional Year Program. The earner received positive feedback from their trainer, produced outstanding work in their coursework, and demonstrated exceptional professionalism, a positive attitude and excellent communication skills throughout the training component.
19c9d3b8-1e64-4ef1-8f22-7ae1de0e94d3.name: Outstanding Achievement Nominee - Special Acknowledgement

badge_template_activities.title: Received at least 2 of the 4 Special Acknowledgement Awards: Effective Communication Skills; Job Search Essentials; Work Readiness Skills; Reliability.
Received a postive endorsement from their trainer

d7039922-46ef-4c21-bfbb-3c38b8e4c931.description: The earner of the LEADership Workouts badge has developed skills and knowledge to lead and respond to key growing leadership themes relevant to the needs of today's workforce. The leadership workouts based on critical areas that the leaders of the 21st century must understand and implement in their managerial roles.
d7039922-46ef-4c21-bfbb-3c38b8e4c931.name: LEADership Workouts

badge_template_activities.title: Module 1: Emotional Intelligence - Learn how to perceive, use, understand and manage emotions to help yourself and others to connect and communicate effectively, make decisions, and manage stress, pressure and conflict. By better understanding and meeting human emotional needs, you can build relationships that inspire productivity and commitment.

Module 2: Managing Conflict - Identify your preferred conflict-handling style as well as the other conflict handling styles that exist and recognise when and how to use them when dealing with conflict. Develop strategies to manage conflict by structuring an action plan for implementation in the workplace.

Module 3: Continuous Improvement - Learn how to apply continuous improvement as an ongoing, never-ending effort to improve products, services or processes through observation and solving problems. Engage all team members and as their leader, develop the team by coaching them to take strong ownership of the process and results.

4b26f2f1-9275-4f02-ac16-e0c79d1be3c2.description: The earner of this badge is a Digital Skills course participant who has demonstrated an understanding of workplace communication skills such collaboration, teamwork and effective communication techniques and strategies to manage meetings and communicate effectively via email.
4b26f2f1-9275-4f02-ac16-e0c79d1be3c2.name: Communication for the Workplace

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Workstyles self-paced learning materials.

Complete Meetings self-paced learning materials.

281dcd90-0ad9-4432-a3b6-d4b0d75940ba.description: The earner of this badge is a Digital Skills course participant who has demonstrated an understanding of the skills needed to represent and manage themselves professionally in the workplace while on internship.
281dcd90-0ad9-4432-a3b6-d4b0d75940ba.name: Work Readiness Skills
